summary: A mistress of a drug dealer in post-war Japan is shocked when she discovers that he is having an affair with her sister.
cast: Kinuyo Tanaka|Sanae Takasugi|Tomie Tsunoda|Mitsuo Nagata|Hiroshi Aoyama|Fusako Maki|Kikue MÃ´ri|Sadako Sawamura|Ken Tanaka|Minpei Tomimoto|Kumeko Urabe
title: Mujeres de la noche
